description: This curried lentil soup is a hearty and satisfying meal in a bowl.
name: Curried Red Lentil Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5L vegetable stock, hot, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pan on a medium heat and cook the ginger, onion, carrots and spices for 10 minutes, stirring all the time.
Stir in the lentils, pour over the stock, bring to the boil and simmer for 30 minutes until the lentils begin to break down.
Pour the mixture into a blender and blitz until smooth. Pour back in to the saucepan, stir in the coconut milk and lime juice, gently heat through and serve.
